summary: A sexually frustrated Palestinian-American agrees to marry an Israeli woman for a Green Card, triggering a war at home with his parents, who will stop at nothing to divorce him from his new wife.
cast: Hiam Abbass|Ghazi Albuliwi|Omer Barnea|Tarek Bishara|Assaf Cohen|Marcus Allen Cooper|Rachel Feinstein|Daniel Gold|Yvonne Gougelet|Nathaniel Heyward|John Mark Hostetler|Salahaldin Hussein|Sam Kalidi|Hany Kamal|Heather Kanig|David Kaplan|Michael Anthony Kerr|Jocelyn Kuritsky|Valerie Lonigro|Mark Lucaj|Shawand McKenzie|Einat Tubi
title: Peace After Marriage
